description: Gets code to perform a specified mapping.

parameters.name: Mapping
parameters.description: The list of mappings from a source table to target tables. (dict) --- Defines a mapping. SourceTable (string) --- The name of the source table. SourcePath (string) --- The source path. SourceType (string) --- The source type. TargetTable (string) --- The target table. TargetPath (string) --- The target path. TargetType (string) --- The target type.

nested_params.name: SourceTable
nested_params.description: The name of the source table.

nested_params.name: SourcePath
nested_params.description: The source path.

nested_params.name: SourceType
nested_params.description: The source type.

nested_params.name: TargetTable
nested_params.description: The target table.

nested_params.name: TargetPath
nested_params.description: The target path.

nested_params.name: TargetType
nested_params.description: The target type.

parameters.name: Source
parameters.description: The source table. The database in which the table metadata resides. The name of the table in question.

nested_params.name: DatabaseName
nested_params.description: The database in which the table metadata resides.

nested_params.name: TableName
nested_params.description: The name of the table in question.

parameters.name: Sinks
parameters.description: The target tables. (dict) --- Specifies a table definition in the Glue Data Catalog. The database in which the table metadata resides. The name of the table in question.

nested_params.name: DatabaseName
nested_params.description: The database in which the table metadata resides.

nested_params.name: TableName
nested_params.description: The name of the table in question.

parameters.name: Location
parameters.description: The parameters for the mapping. Jdbc (list) --- A JDBC location. (dict) --- An argument or property of a node. The name of the argument or property. The value of the argument or property. Param (boolean) --- True if the value is used as a parameter. S3 (list) --- An Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) location. DynamoDB (list) --- An Amazon DynamoDB table location. Param (boolean) --- True if the value is used as a parameter.

nested_params.name: Jdbc
nested_params.description: A JDBC location.

nested_params.description: The name of the argument or property.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value of the argument or property.

nested_params.description: True if the value is used as a parameter.

nested_params.description: The name of the argument or property.

parameters.name: AdditionalPlanOptionsMap
parameters.description: A map to hold additional optional key-value parameters. Currently, these key-value pairs are supported: inferSchemaÂ  -- Specifies whether to set inferSchema to true or false for the default script generated by an Glue job. For example, to set inferSchema to true, pass the following key value pair: --additional-plan-options-map '{"inferSchema":"true"}' (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: PythonScript
nested_items.description: A Python script to perform the mapping.

nested_items.name: ScalaCode
nested_items.description: The Scala code to perform the mapping.
